alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:48AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, southwestern Vilas and western Oneida Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage to near Dorchester. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lac Du Flambeau around 255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Boulder Junction, Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area, Council Grounds State Park, Merrill and Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
